metadata.name: PowerShell Base64 Encoded Invoke Keyword
metadata.comment: Detects UTF-8 and UTF-16 Base64 encoded powershell 'Invoke-' calls

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\pwsh.exe'))) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('powershell\.exe', 'pwsh\.dll')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -e')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('sqbuahyabwbragualq')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('kabgb2ag8aawblac0a')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('jag4adgbvagsazqata')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('sw52b2tll')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ludm9rzs')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('jbnzva2ut'))))

output.summary: Detects UTF-8 and UTF-16 Base64 encoded powershell 'Invoke-' calls
